{/* Header */}

About SignBridge

SignBridge is a platform designed to bridge the communication gap between the deaf community and the rest of the world through sign language education.

{/* Mission */}

üéØ Our Mission

To make sign language learning accessible, affordable, and impactful for everyone ‚Äî from individuals to institutions. We aim to empower learners and instructors alike to connect and grow through inclusive education.

{/* What We Offer */}

üìö Learn Sign Language

Interactive lessons and videos to learn at your own pace ‚Äî whether you're a beginner or improving your skills.

üë©‚Äçüè´ Teach & Earn

Signers can create courses, host lessons, and earn as learners subscribe to their content.

üåç Inclusive Community

A community for learning, sharing, and supporting each other ‚Äî both hearing and non-hearing members.

); }; export default About;
